description: Growing up, Alec is the guy we all wished next door and still has the remnants of the blonde haired, blue-eyed corn-fed midwestern stock but improved with age to include a well rounded chest, very flat stomach, one sexy tattoo on those pumped pecs, a rock hard hungry cock and one beautiful white set of buns. He offers us full view of every bit of skin from every angle and the more you see, the more there is to like. Watching those full swell under those natural, dark golden blonde pubes until he leans his head and with a low, long moan, releases a torrent of sperm all over that lean stomach!
title: Sinful Soul, Scene #02
